trans-unit.source: "Backup" directory does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Direktorijum za rezervne kopije ne postoji.

trans-unit.source: Error deleting
trans-unit.target: Greška pri brisanju

trans-unit.source: Invalid ID
trans-unit.target: Neispravan ID

trans-unit.source: Unable to create backup file
trans-unit.target: Ne mogu da napravim rezervnu kopiju

trans-unit.source: No valid tables were found to backup.
trans-unit.target: Nisu pronađene važeće tabele u rezervnoj kopiji.

trans-unit.source: The import directory must be writable (CHMOD 755 / 777).
trans-unit.target: Uvoz direktorijuma mora biti upisiv (CHMOD 755 / 777).

trans-unit.source: The uploaded file exceeds the upload_max_filesize directive in php.ini. If your server configuration allows it, you may add a directive in your .htaccess.
trans-unit.target: Otpremljeni dokument prevazilazi upload_max_filesize direktivu u php.ini dokumentu. Ako vaš server to dozvoljava, možete dodati direktivu u vašem .htaccess dokumentu.

trans-unit.source: The uploaded file was only partially uploaded.
trans-unit.target: Datoteka je samo delimično postavljena

trans-unit.source: No file was uploaded.
trans-unit.target: Nijedna datoteka nije dodata

trans-unit.source: The extension of your file should be .csv.
trans-unit.target: Ekstenzija vaše dototeke bi trebala biti .csv.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while uploading / copying the file.
trans-unit.target: Došlo je do greške prilikom postavljanja i kopiranja dokumenta.

trans-unit.source: (click to open "Generators" page)
trans-unit.target: (klikni za otvaranje "Generators" stranice)

trans-unit.source: The root category cannot be modified.
trans-unit.target: Glavna kategorija se ne može menjati.

trans-unit.source: cannot be copied.
trans-unit.target: se ne može kopirati.

trans-unit.source: %1$s (ID: %2$s) cannot be saved
trans-unit.target: %1$s (ID: %2$s) se ne može snimiti

trans-unit.source: Shop is not valid
trans-unit.target: Radnja je nevažeća

trans-unit.source: Discount is invalid
trans-unit.target: Popust je nevažeći

trans-unit.source: Tags list is invalid
trans-unit.target: Lista tag-ova nevažeća

trans-unit.source: Advanced stock management has incorrect value. Not set for product %name%
Advanced stock management is not enabled, cannot enable on product %name%
Advanced stock management is not enabled, warehouse not set on product %name%
Warehouse did not exist, cannot set on product %name%
Incorrect value for "Depends on stock" for product %name%
Advanced stock management is not enabled, cannot set "Depends on stock" for product %name%
No image was found for combination with id_product = %s and image position = %s.
trans-unit.target: Nije pronađena slika za kombinaciju sa id_product = %s i pozicijom slike = %s.

trans-unit.source: Supplier is invalid
trans-unit.target: Dobavljač je nevažeći

trans-unit.source: Alias is invalid
trans-unit.target: Alijas je nevažeći

trans-unit.source: YYYY-MM-DD
trans-unit.target: GGGG-MM-DD

trans-unit.source: Format: Between 0 and 100
trans-unit.target: Format: između 0 i 100

trans-unit.source: Supply Order (%s) could not be loaded (at line %d).
trans-unit.target: Narudžbina (%s) se ne može učitati (u liniji %d).

trans-unit.source: Product/Attribute (%d/%d) cannot be added twice (at line %d).
trans-unit.target: Proizvod/Osobina (%d/%d) ne može biti dodat dva puta (u liniji %d).

trans-unit.source: Product (%d/%d) is not available for this order (at line %d).
trans-unit.target: Proizvod (%d/%d) nije dostupan za ovu porudžbinu (u liniji %d).

trans-unit.source: Unit Price (tax excl.) (%d) is not valid (at line %d).
trans-unit.target: Cena po JM(sa PDV-om) (%d) nije validan (u liniji %d).

trans-unit.source: Quantity Expected (%d) is not valid (at line %d).
trans-unit.target: Očeivana količina (%d) nije validna (u liniji %d).

trans-unit.source: Discount rate (%d) is not valid (at line %d). %s.
trans-unit.target: Stopa popusta (%d) nije ispravna (u liniji %d). %s.

trans-unit.source: Cannot read the .CSV file
trans-unit.target: Nije moguće pročitati CSV datoteku

trans-unit.source: %s import
trans-unit.target: %s uvezi

trans-unit.source: (from %s to %s)
trans-unit.target: (od %s do %s)

trans-unit.source: with truncate
trans-unit.target: sa skraćenjem

trans-unit.source: You cannot have two shops with the same name in the same group.
trans-unit.target: Ne možete da imate dve prodavnice sa istim imenom u istoj grupi.

trans-unit.source: Unable to load this shop.
trans-unit.target: Neuspešno učitavanje prodavnice.

trans-unit.source: You need to select at least the root category.
trans-unit.target: Morate da izaberete barem glavnu kategoriju.

trans-unit.source: The "*" operator cannot be used in a nested query.
trans-unit.target: Operator "*" se ne može koristiti u grupnom upitu.

trans-unit.source: The operator "%s" is incorrect.
trans-unit.target: Operator "%s" je neispravan.

trans-unit.source: The LIMIT clause must contain numeric arguments.
trans-unit.target: Klauzula LIMIT mora da sadrži brojčani argument.

trans-unit.source: When multiple tables are used, each attribute must refer back to a table.
trans-unit.target: Kada se koristi više tabela, svaki atribut mora da upućuje na tabelu.

trans-unit.source: Can't add the voucher.
trans-unit.target: Vaučer se ne može dodati.

trans-unit.source: For security reasons, you cannot delete the Administrator's profile.
trans-unit.target: Iz sigurnosnih razloga nije moguće izbrisati Administrator profil

trans-unit.source: You can't put this menu inside itself.
Key length must be 32 character long.
trans-unit.target: Ključ mora sadržati 32 karaktera

trans-unit.source: This key already exists.
trans-unit.target: Ovaj ključ već postoji.

trans-unit.source: To avoid operating problems, please use an Apache server.
trans-unit.target: Da bi ste izbegli operativne probleme, koristite Apache server.

trans-unit.source: Please activate the 'mod_auth_basic' Apache module to allow authentication of PrestaShop's webservice.
trans-unit.target: Aktivirajte 'mod_auth_basic' Apache modul za dozvolu autentifikacije PrestaShop-ovog veb servisa.

trans-unit.source: Please activate the 'mod_rewrite' Apache module to allow the PrestaShop webservice.
trans-unit.target: Aktivirajte 'mod_rewrite' Apache modul da dozvolite PrestaShop veb servis.

trans-unit.source: We could not check to see if basic authentication and rewrite extensions have been activated. Please manually check if they've been activated in order to use the PrestaShop webservice.
trans-unit.target: Nismo u mogućnosti sa proverimo osnovnu autentikaciju i ekstenzije za prepisivanje. Molimo da manuelno proverite da li su opcije aktivirane kako biste koristili PrestaShop webservice.

trans-unit.source: Please activate the 'SimpleXML' PHP extension to allow testing of PrestaShop's webservice.
trans-unit.target: Aktivirajte 'SimpleXML' PHP ekstenziju da dozvolite testiranje PrestaShop veb servisa.

trans-unit.source: It is preferable to use SSL (https:) for webservice calls, as it avoids the "man in the middle" type security issues.
trans-unit.target: Preporučljivo je koristiti SSL (https:) za webservice pozive, da bi ste izabrali 'man in the middle' ranjivosti sistema.

trans-unit.source: You've selected a state for a country that does not contain states.
trans-unit.target: Izabrali ste državu za zemlju koja ne sadrži države.

trans-unit.source: The backup file does not exist
trans-unit.target: Datoteka rezervne kopije ne postoji

trans-unit.source: Unable to open your backup directory
trans-unit.target: Nemoguće je otvoriti direktorijum rezervne kopije

trans-unit.source: You cannot edit the SuperAdmin profile.
trans-unit.target: Profil SuperAdmin se ne može uređivati.

trans-unit.source: You cannot disable or delete your own account.
trans-unit.target: Ne možete da onemogućite ili obrišete sopstveni račun.

trans-unit.source: You cannot disable or delete the administrator account.
trans-unit.target: Ne možete da obrišete ili onemogućite poslednji administrativni nalog

trans-unit.source: You cannot delete this account because it manages warehouses. Check your warehouses first.
trans-unit.target: Ne možete da obrišete ovaj nalog jer on upravlja magacinima. Proverite vašu list magacina.

trans-unit.source: Your current password is invalid.
trans-unit.target: Vaša trenutna lozinka je nevažeća.

trans-unit.source: You should have at least one employee in the administrator group.
trans-unit.target: Trebalo bi da imate najmanje jednog zaposlenog u grupi administratora.

trans-unit.source: The employee must be associated with at least one shop.
trans-unit.target: Zaposleni mora da bude pridružen sa barem jednom prodavnicom.

trans-unit.source: You do not have permission to view this.
trans-unit.target: Nemate dozvolu da pregledate ovde.

trans-unit.source: No file has been specified.
trans-unit.target: Nijedna datoteka nije navedena

trans-unit.source: Unable to open backup file(s).
trans-unit.target: Ne mogu da otvorim rezervnu kopiju

trans-unit.source: Unable to display backup file(s).
trans-unit.target: Ne mogu da prikažem rezervnu kopiju

trans-unit.source: (you must install the [a]Memcache PECL extension[/a])
trans-unit.target: (morate instalirati [a]Memcache PECL ekstenziju[/a])

trans-unit.source: (you must install the [a]APC PECL extension[/a])
trans-unit.target: (morate instalirati [a]APC PECL ekstenziju[/a])

trans-unit.source: (you must install the [a]Xcache extension[/a])
trans-unit.target: (morate instalirati [a]Xcache ekstenziju[/a])

trans-unit.source: The Memcached server cannot be added.
trans-unit.target: Nije moguće dodati Memcached server

trans-unit.source: There was an error when attempting to delete the Memcached server.
trans-unit.target: Greška tokom brisanja Memcached servera

trans-unit.source: Update your PHP version.
trans-unit.target: Ažurirajte Vašu verziju PHP.

trans-unit.source: Configure your server to allow file uploads.
trans-unit.target: Podesite server da dozvoljava postavljanje datoteka.

trans-unit.source: Configure your server to allow the creation of directories and files with write permissions.
trans-unit.target: Podesite server da dozvoljava stvaranje direktorijuma i upisivanje u datoteke

trans-unit.source: Enable the GD library on your server.
trans-unit.target: Omogućite GD biblioteku na serveru

trans-unit.source: Enable the MySQL support on your server.
trans-unit.target: Omogućite MySQL podršku na serveru

trans-unit.source: Set write permissions for the "config" folder.
trans-unit.target: Podesite dozvole za pisanje u config direktorijum

trans-unit.source: Set write permissions for the "cache" folder.
trans-unit.target: Podesite dozvole za pisanje u cache direktorijum

trans-unit.source: Set write permissions for the "sitemap.xml" file.
trans-unit.target: Podesite dozvole za pisanje u sitemap.xml datoteku.

trans-unit.source: Set write permissions for the "img" folder and subfolders.
trans-unit.target: Podesite dozvole za pisanje u img direktorijum and poddirektorijume/rekurzivno

trans-unit.source: Set write permissions for the "log" folder and subfolders.
trans-unit.target: Podesite dozvole za pisanje u log direktorijum i poddirektorijume/rekurzivno

trans-unit.source: Set write permissions for the "mails" folder and subfolders.
trans-unit.target: Podesite dozvole za pisanje u mails direktorijum and poddirektorijume/rekurzivno

trans-unit.source: Set write permissions for the "modules" folder and subfolders.
trans-unit.target: Podesite dozvole za pisanje u modules direktorijum i poddirektorijume/rekurzivno

trans-unit.source: Set write permissions for the "translations" folder and subfolders.
trans-unit.target: Podesite dozvole za pisanje u translations direktorijum i poddirektorijume/rekurzivno

trans-unit.source: Set write permissions for the "upload" folder and subfolders.
trans-unit.target: Podesite dozvole za pisanje u upload direktorijum i podirektorijume/rekurzivno

trans-unit.source: Set write permissions for the "download" folder and subfolders.
trans-unit.target: Podesite dozvole za pisanje u download direktorijum i podirektorijume/rekurzivno

trans-unit.source: Allow the PHP fopen() function on your server.
trans-unit.target: Omogućite fopen() na serveru.

trans-unit.source: Enable GZIP compression on your server.
trans-unit.target: Uključite GZIP kompresiju na serveru

trans-unit.source: Note that you can have several products with the same reference.
trans-unit.target: Zapamtite da imate nekoliko proizvoda sa istom referencom.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure that you would like to delete this entity:
The locale must be installed
trans-unit.target: Vaš lokalitet mora da bude instaliran

trans-unit.source: OK
trans-unit.target: U redu

trans-unit.source: Please fix the following error(s)
trans-unit.target: Molimo Vas da pogledate sledeće greške

trans-unit.source: Checking files...
trans-unit.target: Provera fajlova . . .

trans-unit.source: Missing files
trans-unit.target: Nedostajući fajlovi

trans-unit.source: Updated files
trans-unit.target: Ažurirani fajlovi

trans-unit.source: Changed/missing files have been detected.
trans-unit.target: Promenjeni/nedostajući fajlovi su otkriveni

trans-unit.source: Administrator permissions cannot be modified.
trans-unit.target: Administratorska prava se ne mogu izmeniti.

trans-unit.source: Disclaimer before creating a new backup
trans-unit.target: Izjava o neodgovornosti kod kreiranja rezervnih kopija

trans-unit.source: PrestaShop is open-source software. You are using it at your own risk under the license agreement.
trans-unit.target: PrestaShop je open-source softver, koristite ga na sopstveni rizik u skladu sa ugovorom o licenciranju.

trans-unit.source: This function only backs up your database, not your files.
trans-unit.target: Ova funkcija samo pravi rezervnu kopiju baze podataka, ne i datoteka.

trans-unit.source: By default, your existing database tables will be dropped during the backup recovery (see "Backup options" below).
trans-unit.target: Podrazumeva se da će postojeće tabele iz baze biti obrisane prilikom vraćanja rezervne kopije (pogledajte opcije rezerve kopije).

trans-unit.source: Always verify the quality and integrity of your backup files!
trans-unit.target: Uvek proverite kvalitet i integritet rezervne kopije datoteka.

trans-unit.source: Always verify that your backup files are complete, up-to-date and valid, even if you had a success message appear during the backup process.
trans-unit.target: Uvek proverite da li su datoteke rezervne kopije potpune, ažurne i validne. Ovo je preporučljivo čak i ako ste dobili poruku o uspešnom stvaranju rezervne kopije.

trans-unit.source: Always check your data.
trans-unit.target: Uvek proverite svoje podatke.

trans-unit.source: Never restore a backup on a live site.
trans-unit.target: Nikada ne vraćajte rezervne kopije na sajt koji je u funkciji.

trans-unit.source: I have read the disclaimer. Please create a new backup.
trans-unit.target: Pročitao sam izjavu o odricanju od odgovornosti - Kreiraj novu rezervnu kopiju

trans-unit.source: PrestaShop is not responsible for your database, its backups and/or recovery.
trans-unit.target: PrestaShop nije odgovoran za bazu podataka, rezervne kopije, vraćanje istih i same podatke.

trans-unit.source: Beginning the download ...
trans-unit.target: Počinje preuzimanje ...

trans-unit.source: Please choose a MySQL table
trans-unit.target: Odaberi MySQL tabelu
